Uses of Class
fr.xephi.authme.listener.FailedVerificationException

  • Packages that use FailedVerificationException 
    Package Description
    fr.xephi.authme.listener  

    • Uses of FailedVerificationException in fr.xephi.authme.listener

      Methods in fr.xephi.authme.listener that throw FailedVerificationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OnJoinVerifier.checkAntibot(JoiningPlayer joiningPlayer, boolean isAuthAvailable)
      Checks if Antibot is enabled.
      void OnJoinVerifier.checkIsValidName(String name)
      Checks that the name adheres to the configured username restrictions.
      void OnJoinVerifier.checkKickNonRegistered(boolean isAuthAvailable)
      Checks whether non-registered players should be kicked, and if so, whether the player should be kicked.
      void OnJoinVerifier.checkNameCasing(String connectingName, PlayerAuth auth)
      Checks that the casing in the username corresponds to the one in the database, if so configured.
      void OnJoinVerifier.checkPlayerCountry(JoiningPlayer joiningPlayer, String address, boolean isAuthAvailable)
      Checks that the player's country is admitted.
      void OnJoinVerifier.checkSingleSession(String name)
      Checks if a player with the same name (case-insensitive) is already playing and refuses the connection if so configured.
